description: <p>Due to expansion within the service the Luton 0-19 Universal Services administration team are looking to recruit a new administrator to join their team. The team are responsible for administration support for the Luton Health Visiting & School Nursing services, helping to provide care for children living in Luton aged 0-19. <br /> <br />This is a busy, challenging role and the successful candidate will develop skills in a wide range of administration tasks within a supportive, dynamic team.</p>
title: Luton 0-19 Universal Service Administrator
